== Error Message ==
Calling the constructor of the type 'Rawr.WPF.WindowMain' corresponding to the specified binding constraints threw an exception.
Unable to initialize the configuration system
(Language: Italian)

From what I can tell, you either did not fully extract Rawr from the zip (all the files, not just the exe) or you are compiling the code yourself and it's fubarring on you or you have a bad .NET install?
It used to work since a couple of day ago so it can be a bad extraction from the zip. It can be that some windows update corrupted my .NET install, so i'm gonna try to reinstall it.
Nothing to do even after reinstalling .NNT Framework...
Not sure what else to do here, there's something with your system causing it or everyone would see the issue.
Is this still an issue with the new version 4.1.04?
